@BeSomeone - I use Subler (Mac-only app) to add subs to my encodes. If you're a Windows person, try YAMB.

@TitanBoy - yes, I hope to do Pixar shorts from that collection, tho it'll probably be late July before I get to them. (I want to finish off the Pixar features first)
